rComments: Easiest Class I took. If you understand hindi, then this Business Hindi class will be much more fun as there are debates in every class and a lot of times the debates are in Hindi. The prof is very good and chilled out about everything. Always helpful.

Nice man but not a great lecturer. Each day I felt like he was talking at us for this class and we were all incredibly bored. I can tell he would be a great Hindi professor but I would not recommend Ling115 to anyone
I've had him for several Hindi classes and he is really really helpful.  He also laughs at absolutely everything and his classes are pretty easy.
Great teacher. He is very helpful and a very kind person. He is there to help you no matter what you need and the course is not too hard either.
Adorable teacher, really nice and sweet. He giggles at everything.
